articles.title: Former Boston Red Sox pitcher Bill Lee 'wasn't breathing' after collapse, revived
articles.description: Former major leaguer Bill Lee had stopped breathing after collapsing in the bullpen during an exhibition game, but paramedics and two shocks with a defibrillator helped resuscitate the 75-year-old pitcher, according to a witness at the scene.

articles.title: Oleksandr Usyk bests Anthony Joshua by split decision to retain heavyweight titles
articles.description: Oleksandr Usyk got a stiffer challenge from Anthony Joshua in their rematch Saturday, but eked out a split decision to retain his three heavyweight titles.
articles.content:
Oleksandr Usyk retained his three heavyweight titles with a split-decision victory over Anthony Joshua in their rematch on Saturday in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia.
